column4: Can anyone tell me where the font folder is in Ubuntu, and whether dragging the font files in installs them?
its in /usr/share/fonts and $HOME/.fonts, but you can go to system, prefrences, fonts and then advanced settings or something and the font folder
yes placing them in the folder should install them, otherwise, you may have to update the fc-cache
